nodes.title: Enter Walk of Echoes from any entrance for a cutscene that begins the quest.
nodes.description: Enter Walk of Echoes from any entrance for a cutscene that begins the quest. i.e. Can receive CS upon entering via Xarcabard (S) conflux.

nodes.title: Obtain a Breath of dawn from the unnamed target at East Ronfaure (S) (H-7) (upper left corner).
nodes.description: Obtain a Breath of dawn from the unnamed target at East Ronfaure (S) (H-7) (upper left corner).

nodes.title: Obtain a Breath of dawn at Jugner Forest (S) (I-6) (west edge of square, near river & stump).
nodes.description: Obtain a Breath of dawn at Jugner Forest (S) (I-6) (west edge of square, near river & stump).

nodes.title: Obtain a Breath of dawn at Beaucedine Glacier (S) (H-9) (bottom of ramp leading to Campaign NPC).
nodes.description: Obtain a Breath of dawn at Beaucedine Glacier (S) (H-9) (bottom of ramp leading to Campaign NPC).

nodes.title: The positions are the same where you get the Dawn drops.
nodes.description: The positions are the same where you get the Dawn drops

nodes.title: Enter Walk of Echoes from Grauberg (S) at (F-5) or you can use your Lightsworm at any of the glowing
nodes.description: Enter Walk of Echoes from Grauberg (S) at (F-5) or you can use your Lightsworm at any of the glowing ??? near the Maws to be teleported to Walk of Echoes.and examine the Ornate Door for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Reexamine the door for another cutscene.
nodes.description: Reexamine the door for another cutscene.

nodes.title: Examine the door a third time to battle Cait Sith (NM).
nodes.description: Examine the door a third time to battle Cait Sith (NM).

nodes.title: After defeating Cait Sith, you will choose your reward and finish the quest.
nodes.description: After defeating Cait Sith, you will choose your reward and finish the quest.

nodes.title: Speak with Rongelouts N Distaud in Southern San d'Oria (S) at (I-9) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Speak with Rongelouts N Distaud in Southern San d'Oria (S) at (I-9) for a cutscene. If you have just completed Blood of Heroes, you must wait until next Vana'diel day.

nodes.title: Zone into Xarcabard (S) from Beaucedine Glacier (S) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Zone into Xarcabard (S) from Beaucedine Glacier (S) for a cutscene. The cutscene does not activate if you use the Xarcabard (S) Home Point. Beaucedine Glacier (S) Survival Guide will Warp you close to the zoning point.

nodes.title: Check the Backfilled Pit at (F-8) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the Backfilled Pit at (F-8) for a cutscene. It is located down the ramp as far south and staying to the left as far as you can go - it's at the bottom of the cliff.

nodes.title: Check the Compact Footprint at south (H-8), along the line with (H-9) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the Compact Footprint at south (H-8), along the line with (H-9) for a cutscene. To find it, use the rock formation Sleiney, C.A. is backed against - head in a northerly direction keeping that same rock formation on your immediate left; stop at the very bottom of grid (H-8). The Compact Footprint is on left next to same rock formation. Look at the map for a detailed position.

nodes.title: Check the Sunken Footprint at (H-6)/(H-7) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the Sunken Footprint at (H-6)/(H-7) for a cutscene. It is north and slightly west of the top end of the ramp, hidden among some trees that are butted up against the cliff face.

nodes.title: Check the Compact Footprint at (H-8) again for another cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the Compact Footprint at (H-8) again for another cutscene.

nodes.title: Zone into Batallia Downs (S) from Beaucedine Glacier (S) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Zone into Batallia Downs (S) from Beaucedine Glacier (S) for a cutscene. The cutscene does not activate if you use the Batallia Downs (S) Survival Guide. However, it could be easier to warp to that Survival Guide, zoning into Beaucedine Glacier (S), then turning right around and returning to Batallia Downs (S).

nodes.title: Check the Fresh Snowmelt near the Cavernous Maw at (H-5) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the Fresh Snowmelt near the Cavernous Maw at (H-5) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Touch the Fresh Snowmelt again to begin the battle against the humanoid automaton Menechme.
nodes.description: Touch the Fresh Snowmelt again to begin the battle against the humanoid automaton Menechme. Excenmille will join you for this battle. Anyone can help with this battle, regardless of current completion status of the San d'Oria (S) quest storyline or campaign allegiance. If you join a party with someone who already has Confrontation status or if you lose the fight, you must wait one game day for another attempt.

nodes.title: Make sure you have an inventory slot free, and click on the Fresh Snowmelt again following the battl
nodes.description: Make sure you have an inventory slot free, and click on the Fresh Snowmelt again following the battle for another cutscene and your reward. If you don't have space for the Darksteel Sheet, you'll have to return to watch the cutscene again.

nodes.title: Talk to Rholont at (E-7) to trigger a cutscene.
nodes.description: Talk to Rholont at (E-7) to trigger a cutscene.

nodes.title: Zone out of the area and talk to Rholont again.
nodes.description: Zone out of the area and talk to Rholont again.

nodes.title: Zone into Jugner Forest (S) via East Ronfaure (S) (J-11) to trigger a cutscene (can be done while on
nodes.description: Zone into Jugner Forest (S) via East Ronfaure (S) (J-11) to trigger a cutscene (can be done while on a Chocobo or Mount). Zoning into Jugner Forest (S) by other routes will not trigger cutscene. The Survival Guide right at the East Ronfaure (S) zone line is the fastest option.

nodes.title: With the three key item petrifacts in possession from the previous quest, examine the Provenance Pro
nodes.description: With the three key item petrifacts in possession from the previous quest, examine the Provenance Protocrystal in Provenance to engage and defeat Provenance Watcher. Every alliance member needs all three key item petrifacts to participate, and they are lost on entry.

nodes.title: Check the Regal Pawprints upon victory.
nodes.description: Check the Regal Pawprints upon victory.

nodes.title: Zone and wait until next game day after completing On Sabbatical, then go to The Eldieme Necropolis
nodes.description: Zone and wait until next game day after completing On Sabbatical, then go to The Eldieme Necropolis (S) (J-8) and talk to Erlene, who sends you to Southern San d'Oria (S) to gather information from a council.

nodes.title: Note: ensure that you have completed the starter cities and received the Voidwatch Alarum from Guard
nodes.description: Note: ensure that you have completed the starter cities and received the Voidwatch Alarum from Guardian of the Void; otherwise you cannot begin this quest.

nodes.title: Travel to Ru'Lude Gardens and examine the Door:Audience Chamber (H-6/H-7) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Travel to Ru'Lude Gardens and examine the Door:Audience Chamber (H-6/H-7) for a cutscene. Or travel to the Bulwark Gate in Sauromugue Champaign (S) at (E-6) for the same cutscene. After either cutscene ends you will obtain your White Stratum Abyssite and Voidwatcher's Emblem: Jeuno

nodes.title: The quest Battle on a New Front is now flagged automatically.
nodes.description: The quest Battle on a New Front is now flagged automatically.

nodes.title: Exit Provenance back to Walk of Echoes for the final cutscene.
nodes.description: Exit Provenance back to Walk of Echoes for the final cutscene.

nodes.title: Talk to Rodeupansat at (J-7) of Crawlers' Nest (S) to receive an Evil Warding Seal.
nodes.description: Talk to Rodeupansat at (J-7) of Crawlers' Nest (S) to receive an Evil Warding Seal. He is easily located by teleporting via Campaign Arbiter to Crawlers' Nest (S) and then going through the north pathway at I-9/I-8 of the the center room. From the main entrance, head south at Tucker and run through the brewery, taking the north-eastern most path. Behind the Wooden Gate you will find Rodeupansat. Make sure that you have a valid Brass Ribbon of Service, and that it has not expired, otherwise the NPC will not allow you to start the quest.

nodes.title: Go to the tower in Vunkerl Inlet (S) at (D-11) and click on the ??? on the back side on a boarded up
nodes.description: Go to the tower in Vunkerl Inlet (S) at (D-11) and click on the ??? on the back side on a boarded up window. Watch out for Ignis Djinn, which aggro both sight and magic. If you are soloing this quest and the ??? is surrounded by djinn (it is likely to be), do your best to examine the ??? as soon as possible. If you get aggro, examining the ??? will de-aggro the djinn.

nodes.title: When you check the ???, the seal will be "lost".
nodes.description: When you check the ???, the seal will be "lost".

nodes.title: Return to Rodeupansat in Crawlers' Nest (S) to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Return to Rodeupansat in Crawlers' Nest (S) to complete the quest.

nodes.title: This quest begins immediately following Chasing Shadows where you were transported to present day Ba
nodes.description: This quest begins immediately following Chasing Shadows where you were transported to present day Batallia Downs.

nodes.title: Zone into Jugner Forest from Batallia Downs for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Zone into Jugner Forest from Batallia Downs for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Click on the Metallic Hodgepodge at (F-9)/(G-9) (nearly in the middle of the (F-9)/(G-9) line) for a
nodes.description: Click on the Metallic Hodgepodge at (F-9)/(G-9) (nearly in the middle of the (F-9)/(G-9) line) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Zone into Ghelsba Outpost for a cutscene, where you will receive Orcish infiltration kit.
nodes.description: Zone into Ghelsba Outpost for a cutscene, where you will receive Orcish infiltration kit. Fort Ghelsba Survival Guide is the fastest.

nodes.title: Proceed to (G-9) on Map 1 of Yughott Grotto and click on the Scrape Mark for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Proceed to (G-9) on Map 1 of Yughott Grotto and click on the Scrape Mark for a cutscene.

nodes.title: When ready for battle, have party leader examine Scrape Mark again to gain entrance.
nodes.description: When ready for battle, have party leader examine Scrape Mark again to gain entrance. Your party will be transported to Everbloom Hollow. This battle is trivial at Item Level. (see testimonials) If you fail the fight, then you must obtain a new Orcish infiltration kit by clicking the Clandestine Markings at (I-10) on Map 1 of Ghelsba Outpost. This can only be done once per game day.

nodes.title: After the BCNM you will receive a cutscene and exit at the Ghelsba Outpost zone.
nodes.description: After the BCNM you will receive a cutscene and exit at the Ghelsba Outpost zone.

nodes.title: Proceed to the Cavernous Maw at (H-5) of Batallia Downs and examine it for a cutscene (you must have
nodes.description: Proceed to the Cavernous Maw at (H-5) of Batallia Downs and examine it for a cutscene (you must have visited and unlocked the maw from Batallia Downs (S) in order to get this cs).

nodes.title: After the cutscene you will be placed in Batallia Downs (S) and receive your final reward.
nodes.description: After the cutscene you will be placed in Batallia Downs (S) and receive your final reward. If you have a full inventory at the time of the final cutscene, you will be prompted to examine a ??? near the maw in Batallia Downs (S) after sorting your inventory to receive your reward.

nodes.title: Now able to collect: With the Bundle of half-inscribed scrolls, speak to Rholont in Southern San d'O
nodes.description: Now able to collect: With the Bundle of half-inscribed scrolls, speak to Rholont in Southern San d'Oria (S) (E-7) after completing the quest Face of the Future for a cutscene and to learn Trust: Excenmille (S).

nodes.title: Check the Stonehoused Adit at northern part of (E-9) in North Gustaberg (S) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the Stonehoused Adit at northern part of (E-9) in North Gustaberg (S) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Have your party leader check the Stonehoused Adit again and select the Fire in the Hole objective.
nodes.description: Have your party leader check the Stonehoused Adit again and select the Fire in the Hole objective. If you lose the battle, talk to Solitary Ant standing in North Gustaberg (S) (J-9) (right outside Bastok Markets (S)) for a new Silvermine Key. You also must zone and wait until next game day to get another key.

nodes.title: Talk to Engelhart at (K-10) Bastok Markets (S) .
nodes.description: Talk to Engelhart at (K-10) Bastok Markets (S) . You will need to zone and wait until the game day changes (0:00) in order to receive this quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Pagdako at (H-9) Bastok Markets (S).
nodes.description: Talk to Pagdako at (H-9) Bastok Markets (S).

nodes.title: Return to Present Time Vana'diel and go talk to Iron Eater (J-8) at the Metalworks in front of the "
nodes.description: Return to Present Time Vana'diel and go talk to Iron Eater (J-8) at the Metalworks in front of the "President's Office." Ensure that Iron Eater gives you dialogue related to this quest.

nodes.title: Return to the past and go back to Bastok Markets (S) and speak with Engelhart at (K-10).
nodes.description: Return to the past and go back to Bastok Markets (S) and speak with Engelhart at (K-10). Note: Engelhart is not present when Campaign Battle is happening inside Bastok Markets (S).

nodes.title: Make your way to Grauberg (S), and inside a cave at NW corner of (I-6) there's a ???.
nodes.description: Make your way to Grauberg (S), and inside a cave at NW corner of (I-6) there's a ???. Check it for cutscene. The entrance to the cave is at the southeast corner of (H-5). Be aware that you will need Sneak and Invis here, as there may be Chigoes present. The Grauberg (S) Survival Guide is closest. Otherwise, riding a Chocobo from Pashhow Marshlands (S), or at the very least Bastok Markets (S), will make the trek safer as there are Peiste near the entrance to the cave. You can also ride a Mount to safely get to the cave.

nodes.title: After the cutscene, return to Bastok Markets (S) and speak with Engelhart (K-10) once again.
nodes.description: After the cutscene, return to Bastok Markets (S) and speak with Engelhart (K-10) once again. (For Optional extra dialogue, talk to Pagdako before talking to Engelhart.)

nodes.title: Talk to Gentle Tiger (H-6) in front of the Metalworks (S).
nodes.description: Talk to Gentle Tiger (H-6) in front of the Metalworks (S). Note: If you are currently on the Scholar AF quest, On Sabbatical, you will be unable to get this cutscene until you complete that quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Engelhart (K-10) again for your last cutscene, and your reward of 10,000 gil.
nodes.description: Talk to Engelhart (K-10) again for your last cutscene, and your reward of 10,000 gil.

nodes.title: Note: To start the next quest Claws of the Griffon requires waiting one Vana'diel day after finishin
nodes.description: Note: To start the next quest Claws of the Griffon requires waiting one Vana'diel day after finishing this quest.

nodes.title: Go west past the Portcullis to talk to Louxiard in Watchdog Alley (G-7) Southern San d'Oria (S) for
nodes.description: Go west past the Portcullis to talk to Louxiard in Watchdog Alley (G-7) Southern San d'Oria (S) for a cutscene. Note: You may choose either option during the cutscene. It will not affect the outcome. However, the quest will not proceed until you select the first option.

nodes.title: With at least one Voidstone in possession, proceed to the Veridical Conflux in Pashhow Marshlands (S
nodes.description: With at least one Voidstone in possession, proceed to the Veridical Conflux in Pashhow Marshlands (S) to warp to Walk of Echoes.

nodes.title: Once inside, click the ??? glimmer at the entrance for a cutscene in which your Voidstone is exchang
nodes.description: Once inside, click the ??? glimmer at the entrance for a cutscene in which your Voidstone is exchanged for a Kupofried's corundum. This quest is now complete, and Brace for the Unknown begins.

nodes.title: After meeting the prerequisites above, check the Veridical Conflux at Pashhow Marshlands (S) (J-9) (
nodes.description: After meeting the prerequisites above, check the Veridical Conflux at Pashhow Marshlands (S) (J-9) (near the Pashhow gate crystal) for a cutscene. The quest is flagged at this point.

nodes.title: Speak with any ONE of the Voidwatch Officers at either Southern San d'Oria (F-9), Southern San d'Ori
nodes.description: Speak with any ONE of the Voidwatch Officers at either Southern San d'Oria (F-9), Southern San d'Oria (S) (L-9), Bastok Markets (D-11), Bastok Markets (S) (G-5), Windurst Waters (G-5), or Windurst Waters (S) (G-5) to receive a Voidwatch Alarum.

nodes.title: After the cutscene the quest Drafted by the Duchy is now flagged.
nodes.description: After the cutscene the quest Drafted by the Duchy is now flagged.

nodes.title: Talk to Scarred Shark in Bastok Markets (S) at (G-5) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Talk to Scarred Shark in Bastok Markets (S) at (G-5) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Trade a Heavy Quadav Backplate and a Heavy Quadav Chestplate to Scarred Shark.
nodes.description: Trade a Heavy Quadav Backplate and a Heavy Quadav Chestplate to Scarred Shark.

nodes.title: Zone, then talk to Scarred Shark again for a final cutscene and your reward.
nodes.description: Zone, then talk to Scarred Shark again for a final cutscene and your reward.

nodes.title: Travel to Windurst Waters (S) and examine the left Rhinostery door at J-8 (south section) for a cut
nodes.description: Travel to Windurst Waters (S) and examine the left Rhinostery door at J-8 (south section) for a cut scene. Note: Make sure to examine the Left door, examining the right door will trigger a quest called The Lost Book.

nodes.title: Go to present day Windurst Waters (J-8, south part) and approach the Rhinostery Door, this will trig
nodes.description: Go to present day Windurst Waters (J-8, south part) and approach the Rhinostery Door, this will trigger a cut scene with Maju-Naju and Selenana. After the cut scene, you will receive "The Healing Herb" key item.

nodes.title: Go back to Windurst Waters (S) and..
nodes.description: Go back to Windurst Waters (S) and... check the Left Rhinostery Door for another cut scene. check the Rhinostery Door a second time to trigger a second cut scene, with Maju-Naju and Dantie-Corantie.

nodes.title: Go to (H-13) at Grauberg (S) and examine the ??? to receive a Fireblossom.
nodes.description: Go to (H-13) at Grauberg (S) and examine the ??? to receive a Fireblossom. ??? is located near the center of (H-13) easily accessed via the Grauberg (S) zone to/from North Gustaberg (S)

nodes.title: Return to the Rhinostery Door in Windurst Waters (S) for a cut scene.
nodes.description: Return to the Rhinostery Door in Windurst Waters (S) for a cut scene. Wait one Vana'diel day you will get a second cut scene. (You don't have to wait a full RL Hour, or Full day. Just wait until the Clock hits 00:00) Wait another day for a third cut scene where Maju-Naju will give you back "The Healing Herb" and a Tincture as a reward.

nodes.title: Zone into Bastok Markets (S) from North Gustaberg (S) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Zone into Bastok Markets (S) from North Gustaberg (S) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Speak with Adelbrecht at (E-8) in Bastok Markets (S).
nodes.description: Speak with Adelbrecht at (E-8) in Bastok Markets (S).

nodes.title: Go to North Gustaberg (S) and head to the Eduard Watchtower at (I-6) on Zegham Hill and speak with G
nodes.description: Go to North Gustaberg (S) and head to the Eduard Watchtower at (I-6) on Zegham Hill and speak with Gebhardt. Gebhardt is on the north side on the second level of the hill

nodes.title: Speak with Roderich at the Benedikt Watchtower in North Gustaberg (S) (E-11).
nodes.description: Speak with Roderich at the Benedikt Watchtower in North Gustaberg (S) (E-11). The Campaign Arbiter will warp you in just a little west of Roderich if you are coming from a city.

nodes.title: Check the Barricade in the NW corner of (E-7).
nodes.description: Check the Barricade in the NW corner of (E-7).

nodes.title: Return to Bastok Markets (S) and speak with Adelbrecht to complete the quest and receive your next m
nodes.description: Return to Bastok Markets (S) and speak with Adelbrecht to complete the quest and receive your next memory fragment.

nodes.title: Zone into Southern San d'Oria (S) from East Ronfaure (S) for a cutscene,.
nodes.description: Zone into Southern San d'Oria (S) from East Ronfaure (S) for a cutscene,

nodes.title: Talk to Mainchelite at (I-9) for a cutscene to begin the quest.
nodes.description: Talk to Mainchelite at (I-9) for a cutscene to begin the quest.

nodes.title: Zone out into East Ronfaure (S) for a cutscene (won't work while on chocobo).
nodes.description: Zone out into East Ronfaure (S) for a cutscene (won't work while on chocobo).

nodes.title: Examine three ??? for cutscenes at these locations (Same ones from the Steamed Rams Quest): (J-7) no
nodes.description: Examine three ??? for cutscenes at these locations (Same ones from the Steamed Rams Quest): (J-7) north-western corner of grid, in a small shrub (I-8) at the base of one of the waterfalls on the river (NW section of I-8) (H-8) in a crater on the northern side of the Fortification Tower

nodes.title: Return to Mainchelite for a cutscene and a memory fragment.
nodes.description: Return to Mainchelite for a cutscene and a memory fragment.

nodes.title: Talk to Halver in the Chateau d'Oraguille at (I-9) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Talk to Halver in the Chateau d'Oraguille at (I-9) for a cutscene. You must be on Her Memories: Homecoming Queen to receive this cutscene. Home Point #2 is close to the Chateau.

nodes.title: Head to the Weathered Gravestone (just above the main Eldieme entrance) in Batallia Downs at (I-10)
nodes.description: Head to the Weathered Gravestone (just above the main Eldieme entrance) in Batallia Downs at (I-10) and trade a Lilac for a cutscene. Afterwards you will receive a memory fragment. Survival Guide in The Eldieme Necropolis is closest. Home Point #1 Upper Jeuno is close to Batallia Downs and Areebah in M & P's Market (H-6) sells Lilac for 120 gil each.

nodes.title: Zone into Southern San d'Oria from East Ronfaure for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Zone into Southern San d'Oria from East Ronfaure for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Complete the quests Her Memories: Grave Resolve, Her Memories: Old Bean and Her Memories: The Faux P
nodes.description: Complete the quests Her Memories: Grave Resolve, Her Memories: Old Bean and Her Memories: The Faux Pas to finish this.

nodes.title: Note: Purchase or procure a Philosopher's stone, it will be needed later.
nodes.description: Note: Purchase or procure a Philosopher's stone, it will be needed later.

nodes.title: Talk to Amaura in Southern San d'Oria (G-6) on any job 75+ for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Talk to Amaura in Southern San d'Oria (G-6) on any job 75+ for a cutscene. Be sure after speaking to her that this quest appears in your log; if undertaking multiple Her Memories quests at once, you may have activated the cutscene for Her Memories: Old Bean and not this quest.

nodes.title: Head to Upper Jeuno and talk to Monberaux inside the Infirmary Monberaux at (G-9) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Head to Upper Jeuno and talk to Monberaux inside the Infirmary Monberaux at (G-9) for a cutscene. Home Point #3 is closest.

nodes.title: Head to North Windurst Waters to the East wing of the Optistery at (G-7).
nodes.description: Head to North Windurst Waters to the East wing of the Optistery at (G-7). Examine the "Library book" on the east wall for a cutscene. Home Point #1 is closest

nodes.title: Head to Grauberg (S) and trade a Philosopher's Stone to the Fey Blossoms at (F-5).
nodes.description: Head to Grauberg (S) and trade a Philosopher's Stone to the Fey Blossoms at (F-5). You can use lightsworm to avoid walking. Use a Survival Guide to warp to Rolanberry Fields, Batalia Downs, or Sauromugue Champaign and click the glowing ??? point to teleport you to Walk of Echos. Then click the Verdical Conflux to exit to Witchfire Glen in Grauberg (S). Putting you directly next to the Fey Blossoms.

nodes.title: On the next Vana'Diel day, and after zoning, examine the Fey Blossoms (F-5) again to receive the key
nodes.description: On the next Vana'Diel day, and after zoning, examine the Fey Blossoms (F-5) again to receive the key item: Fey Stone. You can use the same method above for the fastest return.

nodes.title: Head to Southern San d'Oria (S) and talk to Raustigne at (I-7) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Head to Southern San d'Oria (S) and talk to Raustigne at (I-7) for a cutscene. After the cutscene you will receive a memory fragment.

nodes.title: Talk to Thierride in Port San d'Oria at (G-7), inside the Rusty Anchor Pub) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Talk to Thierride in Port San d'Oria at (G-7), inside the Rusty Anchor Pub) for a cutscene. You will receive Thierride's bean creation. You must be on Her Memories: Homecoming Queen to receive this cutscene. Home Point #1 is near the Pub.

nodes.title: Talk to Amaura in Southern San d'Oria inside house on Watchdog Alley at (G-6).
nodes.description: Talk to Amaura in Southern San d'Oria inside house on Watchdog Alley at (G-6). If undertaking multiple Her Memories quests at once, it's recommended you speak to her twice: once so that you can get the appropriate cutscene for this quest, and again so that you can receive the first cutscene for Her Memories: Of Malign Maladies. Home Point #4 is closest.

nodes.title: Return to Thierride for a cutscene and receive a memory fragment.
nodes.description: Return to Thierride for a cutscene and receive a memory fragment.

nodes.title: Zone into Batallia Downs (S) from Jugner Forest (S) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Zone into Batallia Downs (S) from Jugner Forest (S) for a cutscene. Using the Survival Guide in Batallia Downs (S) will put you next to Jugner Forest (S) zone line.

nodes.title: Head to the Bulwark Gate (F-6) in Sauromugue Champaign (S) and click it for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Head to the Bulwark Gate (F-6) in Sauromugue Champaign (S) and click it for a cutscene. Sauromugue Champaign (S) Campaign Arbiter teleport is the fastest. You can use the Survival Guide again, to teleport to Sauromugue Champaign, right next to the Maw to reduce travel time. If you don't have it, you can go through Garlaige Citadel (S), reach the Cavernous Maw and change to Sauromugue Champaign. Also, taking the Survival Guide in Rolanberry Fields , near the Cavernous Maw, change to Rolanberry Fields (S) and run to Sauromugue Champaign (S)

nodes.title: Head to Vunkerl Inlet (S) and trade the Ground Wasabi, Holy Basil, and Rice Vinegar to Leadavox at (
nodes.description: Head to Vunkerl Inlet (S) and trade the Ground Wasabi, Holy Basil, and Rice Vinegar to Leadavox at (J-6). You will receive the key item: Pot of martial relish. All three items can be purchased from Amalasanda (J-8) behind the Tenshodo door in Lower Jeuno, often for cheaper than Auction House prices.

nodes.title: Return to the Bulwark Gate (F-6) in Sauromugue Champaign (S) and check it for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Return to the Bulwark Gate (F-6) in Sauromugue Champaign (S) and check it for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Zone into Batallia Downs (S) from Rolanberry Fields (S) to receive a cutscene and a memory fragment.
nodes.description: Zone into Batallia Downs (S) from Rolanberry Fields (S) to receive a cutscene and a memory fragment.
